title: Complete fresh rebuild of Saanufox streaming platform

requirements.text: Perform a complete fresh rebuild of the entire Saanufox video streaming platform with new canister IDs to resolve the persistent 'Canister ID Not Resolved' error that occurs after deployment
acceptanceCriteria: Application deploys successfully with new backend and frontend canister IDs
Backend canister initializes properly and is accessible via Internet Computer gateway
Frontend loads without 'Canister ID Not Resolved' error
All existing features remain functional after rebuild (video upload, playback, authentication, favorites, watchlist, profile, admin analytics)

requirements.text: Ensure proper backend canister initialization with correct actor configuration and routing setup to prevent gateway resolution failures

quotes: Yeh issue permanently solve ho jayega. Previous deployment mein kuch configuration miss ho gayi thi.

acceptanceCriteria: Backend actor initializes all data structures (Map/Set for videos, users, profiles) correctly on first deployment
Canister responds to health check queries immediately after deployment
Internet Computer gateway can resolve canister ID within 2 minutes of deployment

requirements.text: Verify all existing video streaming features work correctly after fresh rebuild including video CRUD operations, blob storage, access control, user profiles, favorites, watchlist, and admin analytics
acceptanceCriteria: Video upload works for both YouTube URLs and file uploads
Video playback functions correctly for both YouTube embeds and blob videos
User authentication via Internet Identity works
Favorites and watchlist add/remove operations function correctly
User profile setup and settings update work
Admin analytics display registered user count
PWA features (manifest, service worker, offline page) remain functional

constraints: Must generate completely new canister IDs for both backend and frontend
Must preserve all existing functionality from the current Saanufox application
Must use existing Motoko backend architecture with single-actor pattern
Must maintain React + TypeScript + Tailwind + Shadcn frontend stack
Must keep Internet Identity authentication integration unchanged
Must not modify immutable frontend paths (hooks/useInternetIdentity, hooks/useActor, main.tsx, components/ui)
nonGoals: Adding new features beyond what currently exists
Changing the visual design or UI styling
Modifying the Netflix-style theme or branding
Adding new video formats or processing capabilities
Implementing real-time features or WebSocket connections
Integrating third-party video services beyond YouTube URL support
